title: MD & CEO of DEWA visits DEWA Academy (Dubai Electricity and Water Authority)
text: ( Source : Dubai Electricity and Water Authority ) Sat, 03 Oct 2015 HE Saeed Mohammed Al Tayer, MD & CEO , Dubai Electricity and Water Authority (DEWA) toured DEWA Academy , accompanied by Dr Yousef Al Akraf, Executive Vice President of
